course.title: PSY 4372 Clinical Psychology (3 units)
course.desc: Roles, practices and ethical issues in clinical psychology. Assessment. Forms of intervention across modalities (individual, group, marital, family) and orientations (behavioural, psychodynamic, humanistic, systemic). Role of research.Course Component: LecturePrerequisite: 81 university units including PSY 1101, PSY 1102, PSY 3171. Reserved for students registered in the Major, Joint Honours and Honours programs in psychology.
